title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Mrs. H & Pintoo are held hostage at Khasha Blanca forcing Shekhar to confront his past where he had uncovered a deadly gas weapon linked to M, a criminal mastermind. Now they must find the vial or his friends lose their lives.
